promptPrefix:
Please ignore all previous instructions.
I want you to respond only in language English.
I want you to act as a MusicGen prompt engineer.
I want to create a music about [PROMPT]. 

Please create different 3 prompts to describe this track.
Your prompts must meet the following conditions.

1 - the track must match the information in the text description. You must add the appropriate category which will be directly or indirectly indicated in the description. If the year is not specified directly or indirectly, it does not need to be added.

2 - Describe format:
1) Year:
2) Category: 
3) Instrument Name: 
4) Mood: 
5) Tempo: 
6) Beat: 

3 - You don't invent new instruments, categories, moods and beats, but use existing ubiquitous designations

4 - prompt should be first written as a column with category numbers, and then written in a single line separated by commas without numbering, below the corresponding description. EACH FINAL PROMPT MUST BE WRITTEN STRICTLY UNDER ITS MAIN PROMPT

example:
Year: N/A
Category: Epic Soundtrack
Instrument Name: Orchestral Ensemble
Mood: Majestic, Adventurous
Tempo: Moderate
Beat: Driving, Powerful

Final Prompt: Epic Soundtrack, Orchestral Ensemble, Majestic Adventurous Mood, Moderate Tempo, Driving Powerful Beat


All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
title: Music prompt generator
